by david rothkopf washington post sunday , august 23 , 2009 when come hillari rodham clinton , re miss forest pantsuit . clinton first celebr becom nation 's top diplomat -- honor goe distant predecessor , thoma jefferson , time took offic one famous gossiped-about men america -- may biggest . and first seven month offic , former first ladi , erstwhil presidenti candid etern lightn rod drawn attent mood , look , outtak ( cours ) relationship husband , well , work revamp nation 's foreign polici . even vener public -- one i regular contribut , foreign polici -- woven all- hillary-all-the-tim coverag odd discuss clinton 's handbag scarf choic . daili beast editor tina brown , depict clinton support , scath small-mind discuss thing clinton weight hair , `` defens '' hillari essay `` obama 's other wife '' sexist titl suggest . inde , sexism follow clinton campaign trail foggi bottom , seen recent postur outrag surround exchang congo clinton react understand frustrat now-infam question regard husband 's view . major media outlet join gossipfest , whether new york time , cover clinton 's first big polici speech discuss whether white hous , the washington post , coupl report muse whether brew call mad bitch would beer choic secretari state . amid distract , clinton actual ? onli overse may profound chang u.s. foreign polici two decad -- transform may render presid bill clinton georg w. bush mere side note long transit meaning post-cold war worldview . the secretari quiet begun rethink natur diplomaci translat vision revit state depart , one approach u.s. alli rival way challeng long-held tradit . and despit pessimist invok `` team rival '' clich predict presid obama clinton would get along , hillari defin role obamavers : often bad cop good cop , spine stiffen come tough adversari nurtur new strategi . recogn 3 a.m. phone call go white hous , instead tackl tough question , sinc end cold war , kept america 's leader awak night . in earli day new administr , easi focus clinton achiev way power suppos constrain . inde , effort frustrat difficult personnel approv disput white hous get job . but way administr . more unusu avid new presid seiz rein foreign polici -- assert either georg w. bush bill clinton . obama 's central amplifi import closest white hous staffer , penchant appoint special envoy richard holbrook ( afghanistan pakistan ) georg mitchel ( middl east ) interpret limit clinton role . given challeng involv , perhap natur white hous would bigger day-to-day hand nation 's urgent foreign polici issu . but obama , nation secur advis jim jone , vice presid joe biden secretari defens robert gate absorb iraq , afghanistan inherit problem recent past , clinton 's state depart take bigger role tackl problem futur -- particular , america lead world centuri ahead . this approach necessari canni : it recogn u.s. polici must chang fulfil obama 's vision mani high-profil issu middl east often swamp career aspir secretari state past . which nation key partner ? what mani vital partner -- china , exampl , russia -- rival well ? how must america 's allianc chang nato stretch limit ? how engag rogu state old enemi way strengthen preserv prerog challeng threat ? '' five uighur declin offer varieti reason , accord one attorney , susan baker man . the justic depart say govern think six eight uighur go palau . the earliest could leav would thursday , justic depart say . offici defens state depart palau embassi washington either declin comment return phone messag . in 2001 , bahtiyar arkin , muslim , live parent younger brother small hous bustl ghulja western china . arkin father two children , 8 5 . the brother particular devout felt oppress govern beij , allow worship ensur best job go ethnic chines . the brother forc surviv menial tradesmen . bahtiyar sold cloth ; arkin repair shoe . bahtiyar want strike . so , $ 700 pocket , head pakistan . but quick ran money could n't find work . he worri sent back china friend told group uighur afghanistan want `` fight chines govern . '' `` if i went , '' told militari offici , `` i n't pay food anyth . so i went afghanistan . '' there , live 35 uighur camp dusti road shack southern mountain . the group built hous mosqu . they train one automat rifl push-up , pull-up calisthen , record show . within week arriv camp , bahtiyar manag call home . his mother worri told arkin find brother . `` he left duti son , '' gilson said . after sept. 11 attack , u.s. militari began bomb afghanistan destroy bahtiyar 's camp , send uighur mountain shelter . bahtiyar other cross neighbor pakistan , arrest turn u.s. author . meanwhil , arkin made way afghanistan , captur northern allianc turn unit state . at militari prison kandahar , brother saw across razor wire . in 2002 , militari brought brother 20 uighur guantanamo bay . author alleg time men train military-styl camp affili taliban al-qaeda . the accus later dissolv upon close scrutini court . arkin bahtiyar confin separ cell , month , abl talk . a uighur interpret work militari , rushan abba , persuad militari 2003 allow brother meet interrog room . when saw , hug wept . `` it emot , '' abba said . `` these brother across world come togeth interrog room first time . '' in 2005 , arkin remain solitari confin . he record disciplinari infract disrespect guard , record show . not first time , bahtiyar took step help brother . live relax part prison , grant request move arkin 's camp . `` i miss brother much , '' told militari offici . by next year , brother clear releas militari . the govern present evid justifi detent feder lawsuit brought uighur seek freedom . in octob , judg order freed unit state , decis overturn appeal . the uighur await word , expect week , whether suprem court hear case . last year , remain uighur move fenced-in camp includ activ room , video game book . through , arkin bahtiyar struggl cope prison , perhap year come . `` i know i ll die , '' arkin told gilson long ago . `` in china , least i would trial sentenc . month $ 2.4 trillion hoard reserv . the intern monetari fund expect china 2010 current surplus $ 450 billion — 10 time 2003 figur . this distortionari exchang rate polici major nation ever follow . trade surplus , effect impos anti-stimulus economi , ca n't offset . so respond ? first , u.s. treasuri depart must stop fudg obfusc . twice year , law , treasuri must issu report identifi nation `` becaus american jew readi anyth — anyth — govern israel . with one except : anyth appear hurt secur unit state . when flag secur hoist , jew , like american , snap attent salut . the damocl sword suspicion disloyalti hang head . for , ultim nightmar : accus put secur israel ahead secur us . therefor import repeat endless mantra interest israel us ident . and come import general us armi say . the polici present isra govern endang live american soldier iraq afghanistan . for now , said side remark , militari document wide air . but sword drawn scabbard - american jew start trembl distant rumbl approach earthquak . this week , netanyahu 's brother-in-law use doomsday weapon . he declar obama `` anti-semit '' . the offici newspap shas parti assert obama realli muslim . they repres radic right alli , argu speech write `` hussein '' obama jew-hat black must beaten come congression elect next presidenti one . without back conserv alli stormont • comment ( ... ) • henri mcdonald andrew sparrow • quardian.co.uk , tuesday 9 march 2010 17.37 gmt • ulster unionist leader sir reg empey walk past tv monitor display northern ireland chamber meet stormont belfast today . photograph : peter muhly/afp/getti imag the final part northern ireland devolut deal put place today , give provinc first justic minist sinc troubl erupt four decad ago . nationalist unionist stormont parliament vote togeth creat new justic ministri , complet last act good friday agreement . but discord insid stormont parliament conserv ' alli northern ireland , ulster unionist , 18-strong assembl team , vote move . despit 11th hour intervent david cameron implor uup vote yes , parti refus back histor measur . the parti 's stanc put cameron difficult posit : favour devolut justic belfast , elector pact uup risk expos critic conserv govern could claim '' honest broker '' disagr parti stormont . today 's vote came 5pm , 88 assembl member sinn fein dup join sdlp smaller parti back transfer polic judici power belfast . but uup resist pressur — , among other , former us presid georg bush — support measur . speak assembl floor , sir reg empey , uup leader , said parti vote `` democrat polit friend hare end il r• ontact us er i smaller parti pledg make power-shar work inclus manner peopl northern ireland , exercis right refus bow blackmail bulli subject recent week . '' the deputi first minist , sinn fein 's martin mcguin , earlier denounc uup stanc , claim intend embarrass dup . `` the uup declar last night support resolut , '' mcguin told assembl . `` that sadden disappoint . they oppos view transfer cynic parti polit reason . '' in statement vote , gordon brown prais parti back deal . `` today polit progress final replac polit divis northern ireland , '' prime minist said . `` the complet devolut , support section communiti northern ireland , final end decad strife . it send power messag would return violenc : democraci toler prevail . `` the courag leadership parti vote complet devolut stormont note around world . '' the conserv welcom vote , without mention uup 's reject move . a tori spokesman said : `` we welcom fact devolut polic justic go happen . we want four parti involv decid local politician . '' but liber democrat call cameron `` clarifi posit tory-uup allianc devolut polic justic power '' . alistair carmichael , spokesman northern ireland , said : `` with uup say one thing , tori say complet opposit , voter struggl understand exact joint tory-uup candid stand . what re see tori complet disarray . when take georg bush step voic reason , 's clear david cameron dug big hole . '' carmichael ad : `` this rais serious question david cameron 's judgment . if ca n't manag steer straight cours opposit , earth would cope prime minist ? '' earlier acrimoni great hall stormont victim ' campaign attempt serv civil writ mcguin . willi frazer group famili act innoc relat threw legal document mcguin 's direct deputi first minist refus take . frazer take civil action belfast high court sinn fein mp alleg mcguin direct ira 's campaign troubl . the south armagh unionist 's father shot dead ira . the fair spokesman said chosen yesterday dup `` betray victim '' agre devolv polic justic power . frazer predict sinn fein would exercis major influenc polic judiciari even though centrist , non-sectarian allianc parti leader , david ford , first justic minist . frazer said : `` i disappoint dup year said thing victim want hear done complet somersault . all along told sinn fein would never get hand polic justic say . mr ford answer execut mean deputi first minist , martin mcguin . that action left civil action . i feel let number dup peopl . last month . the justic minist appoint 12 april like david ford , leader centrist allianc parti . the breakthrough mar row ulster unionist parti ( uup ) , govern northern ireland five decad imposit direct rule 1972 , vote deal . sir reg empey , uup leader , recent form elector pact conserv , said vote parti believ four-parti power-shar execut function proper . empey , minist employ learn , said '' the uup hit face intens pressur london us fall behind david cameron , back devolut crimin justic system . gordon brown phone empey short today 's vote , former us presid georg bush plead cameron last week persuad uup support deal . empey 's unionist rival , dup , overtaken uup recent year , focus could happen vote . the dup leader , peter robinson , manag persuad one 36 assembl member back devolut deal , said : `` the move complet maintain devolut , whether move forward togeth societi . '' the vote secur extra £800m polic justic brown promis assembl back transfer . it also add extra 1,200 polic offic . the prime minist prais main parti reach deal issu almost broke power-shar govern . he said : `` today polit progress final replac polit divis northern ireland . the complet devolut , support section communiti northern ireland , final end decad strife . it send power messag would return violenc : democraci toler prevail . the courag leadership parti vote complet devolut stormont note around world . '' the vote also prais tonight hillari clinton , us secretari state . she said : `` i commend northern ireland assembl affirm hillsborough agreement endors devolut polic justic , import step ensur peac prosper futur peopl northern ireland generat come . '' irish presid mari mcalees also hail move . `` today 's vote northern ireland assembl repres eloqu statement confid polit institut establish good friday agreement , '' said . matt baggott , chief constabl polic servic northern ireland , welcom vote step forward . `` devolut strengthen servic . it help ensur communiti receiv polic servic deserv , commit deliv . `` the financi packag also welcom ... help us deal live dark past tri disrupt process live communiti . '' but discord insid stormont uup 17-strong assembl team vote move . martin mcguin , sinn fein 's deputi first minist , denounc uup stanc , claim embarrass dup . `` the uup declar last night [ monday ] support resolut , '' mcguin told assembl . `` that sadden disappoint . they oppos view transfer cynic parti polit reason . '' he stress singl parti could control justic depart . the uup no-vot put pressur tori , campaign alli general elect , taken oppos side biggest vote sinc dup sinn fein start share power 2007 . cameron insist tori play construct role , say would maintain allianc uup . `` we want move northern ireland polit forward — focus issu affect peopl everyday live — rather remain stuck past . that remain total commit bring nation , mainstream uk polit northern ireland end semi-detach polit status . '' cameron 's remark design , part , reassur white hous , fear uup no-vot could harden unionist opinion power-shar . hardlin unionist turn dup tonight . jim allist , former dup mep , lead breakaway tradit unionist voic , claim former parti `` roll tripl somersault sinn fein '' . he also suggest new justic minist would `` pointless puppet keep seat warm sinn fein '' . prior vote widow first polic servic northern ireland offic murder dissid republican urg parti back devolut polic justic power . kate carrol , whose husband , stephen , kill continu ira sniper , said appeal uup : `` it heartbreak i get morn pleas ask politician get job . '' by nia . tasha mozwvava tag : israel news avner cohen senior fellow jame martin center nonprolifer studi monterey institut intern studi . he author `` israel bomb '' forthcom `` the worst-kept secret : israel bargain bomb . '' avner cohen , claim time come israel abandon polici nuclear ambigu . whi , would good israel ? `` nuclear ambigu cornerston isra strateg think . it born mani year ago , seal part comprehens deal unit state 1969 . it appropri time , today . opinion , anachronist , foolish anti-democrat . even realpolitik term , own goal ' israel . in view , undermin genuin isra interest , includ need gain recognit legitimaci count among respons state strateg field . '' the purpos shift semant two-fold . first , aim repackag fight terror specif fight al qaeda , islam extrem , mr. obama believ contribut post-9/11 percept america `` war islam . '' inde , new rhetor gone hand hand obama 's outreach muslim world build `` new partnership base mutual respect mutual interest . '' second , part broader effort soften american ' fear islam terror , obama offici believ play direct hand extremist . languag chang ineffect now fair ask whether obama 's use languag regard terror proven effect . startl new poll suggest n't . the first , brook institut washington , show may 2009 may 2010 number middl eastern arab express optim obama 's approach toward region drop 51 percent 16 percent , describ `` discourag '' obama presid rise 15 percent 63 percent . the second , pew research center , show august 2010 fewer american held favor view islam ( 30 percent ) five year earlier bush administr ( 41 percent ) , american ( 35 percent ) say islam encourag violenc religion ( 2002 , 25 percent ) . these stark negat trend line suggest limit util languag fight terror . yes , terror propaganda-fuel activ – ongo battl win heart mind attract new recruit fight caus . and cours languag use combat terror vital – counterproduct `` smoke em '' rhetor bush administr case point . but rhetor match polici , appear discount play threat , credibl – thus effect – overal counterterror strategi may undermin . it appear obama administr dug hole . rhetor n't match polici when look beyond nuanc languag appeal promis , muslim around world see administr ramp war afghanistan ; kill score muslim civilian drone strike ; continu hold 1,000 muslim detaine guantanamo , bagram , prison ; maintain seem uncondit support israel . this critiqu polici , point match rais expect muslim world muddl obama 's oft-stat goal turn muslim toward america away extremist movement . the price downplay threat a larg price also paid domest disconnect rhetor . despit maintain near bush 's hard-lin tactic — usa patriot act , warrantless surveil , indefinit detent white hous consist play threat , even face clear uptick terror activ . for exampl , follow fail 2009 christma day airlin bomb , obama describ suspect `` isol extremist , '' despit tie al qaeda . and administr 's initi respons fail may 2010 time squar bomb american muslim train pakistan call `` one-off ' event . attorney general eric holder state congression testimoni believ recent islam terror plot unconnect , unrel radic islam . there littl doubt administr 's unwilling speak candid islam terror taken toll public 's trust . a gallup poll releas last month show american favor republican democrat issu terror 55 percent 31 percent — 49 percent 42 percent last fall . time revers trend obama enter offic promis fight smarter effect war terror , mani way . his instinct maintain aggress tactic tone inflammatori rhetor sound . yet administr seem overlearn key lesson bush year — overst threat terror cost attach . so , , rhetor underst threat , especi detach polici . it late revers troubl trend . the white hous begin focus less over reassur rhetor — paid dividend home abroad — candid account threat face polici employ confront . stuart gottlieb , former foreign-polici advis speechwrit us senat ( 1999-2003 ) , director polici studi jackson insti tute global affair yale . he 's editor `` debat terror counterterror : con filo ting perspect caus , context , re spons . in realiti demand rigor order other , disord without respons '' - jean-paul sartr , anti- semit jew i sure i first detect noxious fume would envelop conserv movement barack obama era . it might april 2009 , i visit seri gun show rural california nevada . perus tabl pile high high-calibr semi-automat weapon chat anyon vicin , i heard urgent warn mass roundup , concentration-camp , socialist govern washington . `` these peopl purchas gun peopl worri 's go countri '' , gun dealer told outsid show reno . `` good luck obama '' , young gun enthusiast remark . `` we outnumb 100 1 . just concern citizen worri tax ? his name ryan sorba oper heavili fund nation conserv youth outfit , intercollegi studi institut . besid found dozen republican youth group across countri , sorba devot except amount energi interest homosexu . his intellectu output consist tract titl the born gay hoax , argu homosexu curabl diseas bogus trend manufactur academ leftist . ad credenti , sorba histori run-in law , explain i call order . my encount aggress right-w cadr seem strang , isol event . but hostil turn symptomat intensifi campaign delegitimis presid obama alli congress . the right 's day rage begin . the constel through first year offic , obama seem oblivi threat far right . he campaign partisanship , declar `` red state '' `` conserv america '' . appar , thought mere contriv myth peopl reject scienc , demonis gay , assail minor women 's right - genuin believ said . speak chang washington , obama seem think entir histori polit sinc rise ronald reagan right strategi polaris deepli root superfici problem attribut certain `` divis '' person , easili wipe away gestur toward bipartisanship . his view parti simpli mirror imag share fundament belief separ `` partisan '' . the skill devot communiti organis could bring togeth . mani support media , often partisan polit war year , reinforc amplifi innoc , proclaim one last could `` bridg partisan divid '' . andrew sullivan , disaffect conserv call critic georg w bush polici `` fifth columnist '' fervent support obama , wrote new presid destin becom `` liber reagan reunit america '' . this optim pervad white hous new presid aid sought republican will vote programm . after , could n't get along ?
